summary: The story follows a man who returns home to discover a long-buried family secret, and whose attempts to put things right threaten the lives of those he left home years before.
cast: Geoffrey Rush|Nicholas Hope|Sam Neill|Ewen Leslie|Richard Sutherland|Paul Schneider|Robert Menzies|Anna Torv|Eden Falk|Odessa Young|Miranda Otto|Gareth Davies|Wilson Moore|Ivy Mak|Kate Box|Nicola Frew|Sara West|Jessie Cacchillo|David Peterson|Steve Rodgers|Jackie Spicer|Ann Furlan|Danielle Blakey|Shelia Kumar|Brooke Alyse|Sumon Aye|Ray Hounsell|Daniel Moore
title: The Daughter
